item.title: By: Deploying The Latest Ghost on Openshift – Noreta Agus Sasono
item.dc:creator: Deploying The Latest Ghost on Openshift – Noreta Agus Sasono
item.description: […] Openshift doesn’t provide you neither the recommended Node.js nor the required version to install latest stable Ghost on their server and it will cause problems if you update your recent Ghost app. The last known version you can is Ghost 0.11.7. You can read the comments from potatoefist on this post. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Openshift doesn’t provide you neither the recommended Node.js nor the required version to install latest stable Ghost on their server and it will cause problems if you update your recent Ghost app. The last known version you can is Ghost 0.11.7. You can read the comments from potatoefist on this post. […]

item.title: By: potatoefist
item.dc:creator: potatoefist
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/12/19/update-ghost-0-11-3-using-openshift-quickstart/#comment-43">Sasono</a>.
I can confirm this worked. Went from 0.7.5 to 0.11.7. I only ran into a problem in my json file. I had quotes that didn't work well and had to copy good ones from elsewhere in the document. Thanks again. This was a really great thing to have.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sasono.

I can confirm this worked. Went from 0.7.5 to 0.11.7. I only ran into a problem in my json file. I had quotes that didn’t work well and had to copy good ones from elsewhere in the document. Thanks again. This was a really great thing to have.

item.title: By: Sasono
item.dc:creator: Sasono
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/12/19/update-ghost-0-11-3-using-openshift-quickstart/#comment-38">potatoefist</a>.
Sure you can directly update your blog.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to potatoefist.

Sure you can directly update your blog.

item.description: Is this good from the hosted 0.7.5 to 0.11.7?

item.description: openshift-quickstart used node v 0.10 how upgrade my node version to 4.2 Thank you
item.content:encoded:
openshift-quickstart used node v 0.10 how upgrade my node version to 4.2
Thank you
